common.codeTooShort: Code must be at least 5 characters
common.panZoomHint: Drag to pan, scroll to zoom

home.title: iHub Apps
home.description: Interact with various AI models through a simple interface

appsList.title: AI Apps
appsList.subtitle: Choose an application to start a conversation

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

redirectApp.title: External Application
redirectApp.warning: You are about to leave iHub Apps

appChat.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear the chat?
appChat.starterPromptsSubtitle: Select a prompt below to get started quickly
appChat.examplePrompts: Here are some example prompts to get started
appChat.noMessagesSubtitle: Start a conversation by sending a message!

authRequired.title: Authentication Required
authRequired.description: You need to log in to access this page.

fallback.title: AI Assistant
fallback.startConversation: Start a conversation by typing a message.

providers.title: Provider Credentials
providers.description: Manage API keys for LLM providers, web search services, and custom integrations. Provider-level keys are used as fallback for models that do not have their own API key configured.
providers.noResults: No providers found matching your search.

edit.title: Configure Provider
edit.name: Provider Name
edit.apiKeyOptional: (Optional - leave empty to use environment variable)
edit.apiKeyPlaceholder: Enter new API key or leave unchanged
edit.apiKeySet: An API key is currently configured

info.title: About Provider API Keys
info.description: API keys configured here are used as a fallback for all models of this provider that do not have their own API key configured. If you leave this field empty, the system will use the environment variable instead.

create.title: Create New Provider
create.description: Create a new custom provider for storing API keys
create.idHelp: Unique identifier (lowercase, use hyphens instead of spaces)
create.name: Provider Name

info.title: API Key Priority
info.description: When a model requests an API key, the system checks in this order: 1) Model-specific API key, 2) Provider-level API key (configured here), 3) Environment variable. This allows you to set a default API key for all models of a provider while still allowing individual models to override it.

models.title: Model Management
models.subtitle: Configure and manage AI models for your applications
models.name: Name
models.noModelsDesc: Get started by creating a new model.

edit.title: Edit Model
edit.subtitle: Configure model: {{name}}
edit.subtitleNew: Create a new AI model configuration
edit.noApps: No apps are currently using this model
edit.configurationDesc: Advanced configuration options for the model

hints.modelId: Unique identifier for the model (cannot be changed after creation)
hints.apiModelId: Model identifier used by the provider's API (e.g., gpt-4, claude-3-opus)
hints.apiKey: API key for this model. If not provided, the system will use the environment variable for the provider. Keys are stored encrypted.
hints.apiKeySet: âœ“ API key is configured for this model
hints.supportsImageGeneration: Enable if this model can generate images (e.g., Gemini Image models)

placeholders.apiKey: Enter API key (optional - will use environment variable if not set)
placeholders.apiKeySet: API key is set (leave blank to keep current)

auth.addProvider: Add a provider to enable OIDC authentication

oauth.title: OAuth Clients
oauth.subtitle: Manage OAuth 2.0 clients for external API access
oauth.clientSecretWarning: Save this secret now. It will not be shown again.
oauth.name: Client Name
oauth.noAppsSelected: No apps selected - client can access all apps
oauth.noModelsSelected: No models selected - client can access all models
oauth.rotateSecretConfirm: Are you sure you want to rotate the secret? The old secret will stop working immediately.
oauth.rotateSecretSuccess: Secret rotated successfully. Save the new secret now.
oauth.generateTokenDesc: Select the expiration period for this token and click Generate.
oauth.expirationRange: Enter a value between 1 and 3650 days (10 years)
oauth.tokenWarning: Save this token now. It will not be shown again.
oauth.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this OAuth client? All issued tokens will stop working.

validation.tokenExpirationInvalid: Token expiration must be between 1 and {{max}} minutes
validation.expirationDaysInvalid: Expiration must be between 1 and 3650 days

system.title: System Administration
system.forceDesc: Trigger a force refresh for all clients. This will clear all browser caches, localStorage, and force clients to reload all assets (JS, CSS, fonts, configurations) without using browser cache. The disclaimer acceptance will be preserved.
system.warningDesc: This action will force all connected clients to reload their browsers on their next page interaction. Use this when deploying critical updates or when clients need to clear cached data.
system.triggerSuccess: Force refresh triggered successfully! New salt: {{salt}}. All clients will refresh on their next page load.
system.passwordDesc: Update the admin password. The new password will be encrypted using bcryptjs and stored securely.
system.passwordChanged: Admin password changed successfully and encrypted
system.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 3 characters long
system.backupDesc: Export your complete configuration as a ZIP file for disaster recovery, or import a configuration backup to restore your system. This includes all apps, models, groups, custom pages, and frontend customizations (CSS, HTML, etc.).
system.backupInfo1: All configuration files (platform, apps, models, groups, UI)
system.importSuccess: Configuration imported successfully! {{fileCount}} files imported. Current configuration backed up as: {{backup}}
system.importConfirm: Are you sure you want to import this configuration? This will replace ALL existing configurations, apps, models, and custom pages. A backup of the current configuration will be created automatically.
system.backupNote: Note: Imports will automatically create a backup of your current configuration before replacing it.
system.versionDesc: Current version information for the application, frontend, and backend components.
system.updateAvailable: A new version of iHub Apps is available!
system.noUpdateAvailable: You are running the latest version

logging.title: Logging Configuration
logging.description: Configure application logging levels and output

levelDescriptions.info: Log general information, warnings, and errors (recommended)
levelDescriptions.http: Log HTTP requests along with info, warnings, and errors
levelDescriptions.verbose: Log detailed information useful for troubleshooting
levelDescriptions.silly: Log everything - use only for detailed debugging

tools.title: Tool Management
tools.subtitle: Create, edit, and manage AI tools / function calling for your iHub Apps
tools.enableDisableSubtitle: Enable or disable tools for this chat
tools.noToolsDescription: Get started by creating a new tool.
tools.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this tool?
tools.createDescription: Create a new AI tool / function
tools.name: Name
tools.nameHelp: Display name for the tool in different languages
tools.descriptionHelp: Description shown to the LLM for tool selection
tools.parametersHelp: JSON Schema definition for tool parameters
tools.functionsHelp: Define multiple functions for this tool (e.g., findUser, getAllUserDetails). Each function should have description and parameters. Leave empty {} for regular single-function tools.
tools.isSpecialToolHelp: Provider-specific tools that are handled directly by the model provider (e.g., Google Search Grounding, OpenAI Web Search)
tools.providerHelp: Provider identifier (e.g., "google" for Google Search, "openai" for OpenAI, "openai-responses" for response-based tools)
tools.scriptEditorInfo: Edit the JavaScript code for this tool. Changes will be saved to server/tools/

feedback.commentPlaceholder: Tell us more about your rating (optional)

errors.imageUploadDisabled: Image upload is not supported by the selected model. Please choose a different model or upload a text file instead.
errors.fileUploadDisabled: File upload is disabled for this application.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: We couldn't find the page you're looking for.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this page.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.message: Access to this resource is forbidden.

serverError.title: Server Error
serverError.message: Something went wrong on our end.
serverError.subtitle: Please try again later.

descriptions.gpt-3.5-turbo: Fast and efficient model for most everyday tasks and conversations
descriptions.gpt-4: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities
descriptions.claude-3-opus: Anthropic's most powerful model with exceptional reasoning capabilities
descriptions.claude-3-sonnet: Balanced performance and value for enterprise and everyday tasks
descriptions.gemini-1.5-flash: Google's versatile model, optimized for text and code tasks
descriptions.local-vllm: Advanced model with strong reasoning and knowledge capabilities

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: An unexpected error occurred in the application. The development team has been notified.
error.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.apiKeyMissing: API key not found for model
error.failedToGenerateResponse: Failed to generate response. Please try again or select a different model.
error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
error.sessionExpiredReconnecting: Session expired. Reconnecting to authentication provider...

appConfig.title: Configuration
appConfig.temperatureDescription: Controls randomness: Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.
appConfig.systemPromptDescription: Instructions for the AI at the beginning of the conversation.
appConfig.toolsSettingsHelp: Enable or disable individual tools for this session

chatMessage.saveImageWarning: Download this image. Images are not persisted.
chatMessage.imageNotPersistedDetail: Generated images are not persisted when navigating away due to browser storage limitations. Images remain visible during the active session.

serverErrors.missingFeedbackFields: Missing required fields: messageId, appId, chatId, and rating are required
serverErrors.apiKeyNotFound: API key not found for provider: {provider}
serverErrors.authenticationFailed: Authentication failed for {provider} API. Please check your API key.
serverErrors.rateLimitExceeded: Rate limit exceeded for {provider} API. Please try again later.
serverErrors.serviceError: {provider} API service error. The service might be experiencing issues.
serverErrors.serviceUnavailable: {provider} API is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few moments.
serverErrors.contextWindowExceeded: The input is too long for model {modelId}. Please reduce the message size or use a model with a larger context window. Current limit: {tokenLimit} tokens.
serverErrors.invalidRequest: Invalid request sent to {provider} API. Please check your input and try again.
serverErrors.requestTimeout: Request timed out after {timeout} seconds. The model might be under high load.
serverErrors.llmApiError: LLM API request failed with status {status}
serverErrors.connectionRefused: Connection refused when trying to access {provider} API for model {model}. Please check your connection or server configuration.
serverErrors.modelAccessDenied: API key is not allowed to use this model

toolErrors.UNSUPPORTED_PROTOCOL: Only HTTP and HTTPS URLs are supported.
toolErrors.AUTH_REQUIRED: Authentication is required for this page.
toolErrors.TLS_ERROR: Certificate error occurred. Please contact administrator.

descriptions.keep: Keep the original style of the text.
descriptions.concise: Provide shorter and more direct responses. Be brief and precise.
descriptions.formal: Provide clear, professional, and formal responses in elevated language.
descriptions.explanatory: Provide educational responses that clearly explain concepts as if teaching a student.
descriptions.creative: Provide imaginative and artistic responses using metaphors and analogies.
descriptions.persuasive: Provide compelling responses using rhetorical techniques.
descriptions.humorous: Provide entertaining and funny responses with jokes and wordplay.
descriptions.empathetic: Provide compassionate and understanding responses showing empathy and support.
descriptions.friendly: Provide warm and accessible responses in a friendly tone.
descriptions.technical: Provide detailed and precise responses using technical language.
descriptions.casual: Provide relaxed and informal responses in everyday language.
descriptions.detailed: Provide thorough and comprehensive responses covering all aspects of the topic.
descriptions.analytical: Provide logical and critical responses that deeply analyze the topic.
descriptions.assertive: Provide confident and strong responses with a clear position.

auth.canCloseWindow: You can now close this window.

serverErrors.TEAMS_NO_TENANT_ID: No tenant ID found in token or configuration
serverErrors.TEAMS_JWT_SECRET_NOT_CONFIGURED: JWT secret not configured for Teams authentication

description.short: Access AI-powered applications directly in Microsoft Teams
description.full: iHub Apps provides a comprehensive suite of AI-powered applications for enterprise users. Access chat assistants, document analyzers, and specialized AI tools directly within Microsoft Teams.

jira.title: JIRA Integration
jira.description: Connect your JIRA account to search and manage tickets

confirmations.addComment: Are you sure you want to add this comment?
confirmations.transitionTicket: Are you sure you want to change the ticket status?
